author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
The article gives the ride height as twenty inches, not feet. (” not ‘).

“if the good Lord had meant me to fly he would have given me first class tickets”

author: Phil
content:
Doesn’t look like 20-feet out of the water to me, more like 6 or 8 feet.
